Package labprog2.util.graph

Class MatrixGraph<Node>

java.lang.Object
labprog2.util.graph.MatrixGraph<Node>

Graph<Node>

  • Constructor Details

    • MatrixGraph

      public MatrixGraph(int maxNodes)
      Implements a directional weighted graph as a matrix.
      Parameters:
      maxNodes - maximum number of allowed nodes (order of the matrix).

    • MatrixGraph

      public MatrixGraph(List<Node> V, List<Edge<Node>> E) throws NodeAlreadyPresentException, NodeNotPresentException
      Implements a directional weighted graph as a matrix.
      Parameters:
      V - set of vertices of the graph.
      E - set of edges of the graph.
      Throws:
      NodeAlreadyPresentException - thrown if a node is duplicated in V.
      NodeNotPresentException - thrown if E contains an edge that has at least one endpoint not contained in V.

  • Method Details

    • addNode

      public void addNode(Node node) throws FullGraphException, NodeAlreadyPresentException
      Adds a node to the graph, given it is not already present nor the graph is full. Implemented by increasing the counter of the amount of current nodes and by mapping the node to an integer that represents an index of the matrix.
      Specified by:
      addNode in interface Graph<Node>
      Parameters:
      node - object implementing the node interface to be added to the graph.
      Throws:
      FullGraphException - thrown if the graph is already full, as defined by its implementation.
      NodeAlreadyPresentException - thrown if the node being added is already present
      See Also:
      • MatrixGraph

    • addEdge

      public void addEdge(Edge<Node> edge) throws NodeNotPresentException
      Adds an edge to the graph. Both ends must be nodes already present. If the edge is already present, it is substituted. Implemented by setting the value of the entry (i,j) in the matrix to the weight of the edge provided.
      Specified by:
      addEdge in interface Graph<Node>
      Parameters:
      edge - Edge to be added or updated.
      Throws:
      NodeNotPresentException - thrown if either of the edge endpoints is not present in the graph.
      See Also:
      • Edge

    • getEdgesFrom

      public List<Edge<Node>> getEdgesFrom(Node srcNode) throws NodeNotPresentException
      Returns a list containing all the edges that come out of the specified node. Implemented by returning all the nodes relative to the indexes j of the non-zero entries (i,j) of the graph, where i represents the index of the provided node.
      Specified by:
      getEdgesFrom in interface Graph<Node>
      Parameters:
      srcNode - source node of all the queried edges.
      Returns:
      List containing all the edges.
      Throws:
      NodeNotPresentException - thrown if the specified node is not present in the graph.

    • getShortestPath

      public Path<Node> getShortestPath(Node srcNode, Node desNode) throws NodeNotPresentException
      Returns the shortest path between two nodes within a graph. Implemented with Dijkstra's path finding algorithm.
      Specified by:
      getShortestPath in interface Graph<Node>
      Parameters:
      srcNode - source node (starting node of the path).
      desNode - destiny node (final node of the path).
      Returns:
      shortest path.
      Throws:
      NodeNotPresentException - thrown if either of the specified nodes is not present.

    • getShortestNonDirectPath

      public Path<Node> getShortestNonDirectPath(Node srcNode, Node desNode) throws NodeNotPresentException
      Gets the shortest path with at least one intermediate node between two specified nodes. Implemented with Dijkstra's path finding algorithm.
      Specified by:
      getShortestNonDirectPath in interface Graph<Node>
      Parameters:
      srcNode - source node (starting node of the path).
      desNode - destiny node (final node of the path).
      Returns:
      shortest path with at least one intermediate node.
      Throws:
      NodeNotPresentException - thrown if either of the specified nodes is not present.

    • connects

      public boolean connects(Node srcNode, Node desNode) throws NodeNotPresentException
      Verifies whether there exists an edge between two nodes in the graph. Checks if the entry (i,j) of the matrix that corresponds to the provided nodes is not zero.
      Specified by:
      connects in interface Graph<Node>
      Parameters:
      srcNode - source node.
      desNode - destiny node.
      Returns:
      true if there exists an edge, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      NodeNotPresentException - If either of the specified edges is not present in the graph.

    • has

      public boolean has(Node node)
      Verifies the presence of a node in the graph.
      Specified by:
      has in interface Graph<Node>
      Parameters:
      node - queried node.
      Returns:
      true if the node is present in the graph, false otherwise.

    • has

      public boolean has(Edge<Node> edge) throws NodeNotPresentException
      Verifies the presence of an edge in the graph.
      Specified by:
      has in interface Graph<Node>
      Parameters:
      edge - queried edge.
      Returns:
      true if the edge is present, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      NodeNotPresentException - if either of the provided edge endpoints (nodes) is not present in the graph.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Verifies if graph is empty.
      Specified by:
      isEmpty in interface Graph<Node>
      Returns:
      true if there are no nodes, false otherwise.

    • removeEdgeBetween

      public Edge<Node> removeEdgeBetween(Node srcNode, Node desNode) throws EdgeNotPresentException, NodeNotPresentException
      Removes the directional edge between the specified nodes, if it exists.
      Specified by:
      removeEdgeBetween in interface Graph<Node>
      Parameters:
      srcNode - source node of the edge to be removed.
      desNode - destiny node of the edge to be removed.
      Returns:
      returns the edge that was removed.
      Throws:
      EdgeNotPresentException - thrown if there is no edge between the specified nodes
      NodeNotPresentException - thrown if either of the specified nodes is not present

    • getWeightBetween

      public int getWeightBetween(Node srcNode, Node desNode) throws EdgeNotPresentException, NodeNotPresentException
      Returns the weight of the edge between two nodes of the graph.
      Specified by:
      getWeightBetween in interface Graph<Node>
      Parameters:
      srcNode - source node of the queried edge.
      desNode - destiny node of the queried edge.
      Returns:
      weight of the edge with the specified endpoints.
      Throws:
      EdgeNotPresentException - thrown if there is no edge between such nodes.
      NodeNotPresentException - thrown if either of the nodes is not present in the graph.

    • getEdgeBetween

      public Edge<Node> getEdgeBetween(Node srcNode, Node desNode) throws NodeNotPresentException, EdgeNotPresentException
      Retrieves the edge between two nodes in the graph, if it exists.
      Specified by:
      getEdgeBetween in interface Graph<Node>
      Parameters:
      srcNode - source node of the queried edge.
      desNode - destiny node of the queried edge.
      Returns:
      returns the edge between the specified nodes.
      Throws:
      NodeNotPresentException - thrown if either of the nodes is not present.
      EdgeNotPresentException - thrown if there is no edge between the specified nodes.
